info.title: Daza.io RESTful API
info.description:
- Authentication
- Pagination
- Rate Limiting
- User Agent Required
- In-app Pages
- App Links

请求响应示例
```json
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "..."
    "errors": [
        {
            "code": 10000,
            "field": "user",
            "message": "用户 不存在。"
        }
    ],
    "pagination": {
        "total": 10,
        "per_page": 10,
        "current_page": 1,
        "last_page": 1,
        "from": 1,
        "to": 10
    },
    "data": {
        ...
    }
}
```
